data.name: Suspects: Mystery Mansion
data.detailed_description:
WITH PURCHASE YOU GET THE “SKELLY” PACK



Enter the Mansion with our Steam exclusive bundle, containing the unique playable character “Skelly” and access to our Gold Pass, where you can earn tons of rewards — including characters and cosmetics...

This bundle includes:

  • Skelly: An exclusive skeleton character, only available on Steam
  • Gold Pass: Redeem your Gold Pass for access to unique rewards


About the Game

Gather clues, complete tasks and discover which player is the killer! Suspects: Mystery Mansion is a social deduction game that features native voice chat, tons of unique game modes and regular fresh content — all within a stylized world of unique characters!




Talk to other players with no third-party software required! Found a clue you wish to discuss in a meeting with your fellow guests? Or perhaps you want to deceive others to protect your identity as the killer… Communication will be key to your team’s success inside the Mansion.




Participate in eight unique game modes with special roles! These include:

  • Chit Chat: Talk in proximity with nearby players. Plan strategies or reveal your identity as the killer as you take them out!
  • Vigilantes: Take matters into your own hand and become the Vigilante — find and exact vengeance on the killer, or get yourself killed trying!
  • Hide & Kill: No body reporting, no voting, no bomb sabotage. The killers are coming, hide… and survive if you can!
  • Poisoner: Killers become poisoners in this unique game mode, allowing them to administer a slow death to any guest unfortunate enough to cross their path!
  • Master of Disguise: Take on a new role as the spy, a killer who can take on the appearance of any player around them to mislead other players.
  • Everyone Can Kill: It's a free-for-all! Guests can kill other players, just like killers — everyone is dangerous. How will you adapt your strategy to obtain victory?
  • Boogie Monster: One player will become the boogie monster, a frightening super-killer with mysterious powers and a killer touch!
  • Team Wars: No tasks, no reporting… Just chaos! Players are separated into three teams in this Battle Royale! The winner is the last team standing.
Hop straight into a custom lobby, invite your friends and choose your favorite game modes for a fun-packed session of intensive investigative gameplay.




Join millions of existing players inside the Mansion. Enjoy cross-platform gameplay and progression with both Android and iOS. Set up custom lobbies for you and your friends, or compete in our matchmaking queue to climb the leaderboard!

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
